name: GeoSlime Climb!
description:
GeoSlime Climb! is a platformer game  inspired by the game Jump King where you play as a cute green cubic slime. 

You can move around by rolling on your sides or jump by squishing your body.

Your goal is to make it to the top as fast as you can while collecting each of the 3 slime coins per level.

Be wary of the rapidly increasing level of difficulty through each of the 6 levels!
